books.name: Ignatius: Epistle to the Virgin Mary

chapters.name: Ignatius: Epistle to the Virgin Mary 1

verses.name: Ignatius: Epistle to the Virgin Mary 1:1
verses.text: The Epistle of Ignatius to the Virgin Mary   Her friend Ignatius to the Christ-bearing Mary.

verses.name: Ignatius: Epistle to the Virgin Mary 1:2
verses.text: Thou oughtest to have comforted and consoled me who am a neophyte, and a disciple of thy beloved John.

verses.name: Ignatius: Epistle to the Virgin Mary 1:3
verses.text: For I have heard things wonderful to tell respecting thy son Jesus, and I am astonished by such a report.

verses.name: Ignatius: Epistle to the Virgin Mary 1:4
verses.text: But I desire with my whole heart to obtain information concerning the things which I have heard from thee, who wast always intimate and allied with Him, and who wast acquainted with all His secrets.

verses.name: Ignatius: Epistle to the Virgin Mary 1:5
verses.text: I have also written to thee at another time, and have asked thee concerning the same things.

verses.name: Ignatius: Epistle to the Virgin Mary 1:6
verses.text: Fare thou well; and let the neophytes who are with me be comforted of thee, and by thee, and in thee, Amen.
